actions.name: Intimidate

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.
Effect: All valid creatures in range lose -1 ATK stage for 5 activations and gain Fear 2. The user's Intimidate Skill checks have an additional +10 bonus.
